The Honda WR-V’s suspension setup is softly sprung. It sails over minor potholes, slightly disjointed patches and small sharp bumps with aplomb. Storage capacity is another trump card, testified by the numerous stowage spaces such as cup holders and space in the front armrest and front seat pockets. The many reasons to purchase the Honda WR-V – practicality, spacious cabin and comfort.

attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0872502066. 3 YEAR 45 000 SERVICE PLAN
150 000KM WARRANTY

Drive with an easy mind. Use the hands-free card* to unlock the doors automatically as you approach the vehicle. it also allows you to start and stop the vehicle without getting the key out of your pocket, and automatically locks the car as you walk away. 

on the road, the blind spot warning* picks up any hidden vehicles, while the speed limiter and cruise control functions help you concentrate on your driving. delivering real support, in the city and on the open road!

Contact us today. We deliver country wide, metallic color, licensing and Service & delivery fees are not included.

Being a crossover, the BR-V rides higher than the Mobilio and is designed to seat seven people. In terms of exterior styling, the BR-V features roof rails with black plastic cladding seen over the wheel arches and side skirts while the front end features under body protection. the rear end features C-shaped graphics on the tail-lights and the BR-V rides on 16-inch alloy wheels. If you have more than three kids, you’re going to need a car that offers room for everybody, and it should also be able to keep all occupants safe and comfortable.
